interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Segbeauty empty bottle 290 Review Date: 2019/09/02 Store: TruuMe Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Segbeauty', 'Color': 'Clear', 'Material Type Free': 'Dairy Free', 'Item Weight': '3.4 Ounces', 'Bottle Nipple Type': 'Vented', 'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 3.19 x 2.24 inches; 3.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'AM-160083-03', 'UPC': '701822757553 701822760621'} Review Text: This mister is awesome! I got it to use on my house plants and it works great. It holds a little of 5oz, the mist very fine, handle is easy to pull, and it's a continuous spray for few seconds per handle pump! Might consider using on my hair in the future too!

Please let me know if you have any questions about my review, or if you have found it of any help to you. Review Title: Works great as a plant mister Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Godefroy Tint Kit for Spot Coloring, Dark Brown Godefroy ['Godefroy Professional Hair Color Tint Kit is ideal for coloring small areas of the scalp and facial hair. Pre-measured in separate capsule units, it gives you the versatility to use the exact amount of color with no waste. Great for use on beards, mustaches, sideburns, & temple, anywhere you need a little color. Also can be used for root touch ups in between hair color treatments. No odor & Blends well with existing color'] {'Color': 'Dark Brown', 'Brand': 'Godefroy', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.2 x 2.5 x 2.1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '203', 'UPC': '852661595933 604106323737 186297000067 726714358472 801276566487', 'Manufacturer': 'Godefroy'} i searched "dark brown eyebrow tint" and this came up and i was about to make the purchase until i fully read the description "This product must not be used for dyeing the eyelashes and eyebrows. To do so may cause blindness" so i dont know why people are condoning the use of this product on their eyebrows/ eye area. i guess they dont care there is a chance of losing eye sight. also amazon needs to remove this from results for eyebrow tint... glad i saw before i bought! Not for use near eyes! may cause blindness! Segbeauty empty bottle 290 TruuMe {'Brand': 'Segbeauty', 'Color': 'Clear', 'Material Type Free': 'Dairy Free', 'Item Weight': '3.4 Ounces', 'Bottle Nipple Type': 'Vented', 'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 3.19 x 2.24 inches; 3.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'AM-160083-03', 'UPC': '701822757553 701822760621'} This mister is awesome! I got it to use on my house plants and it works great. It holds a little of 5oz, the mist very fine, handle is easy to pull, and it's a continuous spray for few seconds per handle pump! Might consider using on my hair in the future too!

Please let me know if you have any questions about my review, or if you have found it of any help to you. Works great as a plant mister
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Interest:** The user continues to show a preference for hair coloring products, particularly those suitable for touch-ups and small areas, while now displaying an additional interest in versatile misting solutions that could potentially be used on hair.
- **Color Preference:** They remain focused on dark brown shades for hair coloring.
- **Awareness and Caution:** They maintain a strong sense of caution regarding product safety, especially around sensitive areas like the eyes. The user values thorough product descriptions to mitigate health risks.
- **Skepticism Towards Popular Use:** There is an ongoing skepticism about the use of products not explicitly designed for certain applications, reinforcing their emphasis on safety over convenience.
- **Buying Behavior:** The user conducts extensive research before buying any products, demonstrating a cautious and informed approach to their purchasing decisions.
- **Rating Trends:** Their average rating indicates a rigorous expectation for both functionality and safety, with a demand for clear communication in product descriptions.

The latest interaction highlights their enthusiasm for a misting product that works well for plants, indicating a willingness to explore multifunctional tools that align with their safety-first mentality. They remain thoughtful and safety-conscious in their beauty choices while being open to innovative solutions that can cater to their precise needs.
